Bootcamps.Bootcamp05.edu.monash.fit2099.vehicles

Class Vehicle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Bootcamps.Bootcamp05.edu.monash.fit2099.vehicles.Vehicle
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BobberBike, ChopperBike, SportCar

    public abstract class Vehicle
extends java.lang.Object
    The Vehicle class handles the creation, characteristics and behaviour of all vehicles present in the car auction. It represents a generic vehicle. This is version 5 of this class, as it is from Week 5's Bootcamp.

      The Vehicle contructor creates a new instance of a vehicle.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Vehicle

        public Vehicle(int vehicleId,
               java.lang.String make,
               java.lang.String model,
               java.lang.Integer modelYear)
        throws java.lang.Exception
        The Vehicle contructor creates a new instance of a vehicle.
        Parameters:
        vehicleId - The id number of the vehicle.
        make - The maker of the vehicle.
        model - The model of the vehicle.
        modelYear - The model year of the vehicle.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when maker, model, or model year is incorrect in format.

    • Method Detail

      • addBid

        public void addBid(int clientId,
                   int price,
                   java.lang.String date)
        The addBid method adds a bid to the vehicle.
        Parameters:
        clientId - the id number of the client who placed the bid.
        price - the price of the bid.
        date - the date the bid was placed.

      • getBid

        public Bid getBid(int clientId)
        Getter to get a bid from the vehicle.
        Parameters:
        clientId - the id of the client who placed the bid.
        Returns:
        the Bid (Bid instance) placed by the client.

      • setMake

        public boolean setMake(java.lang.String make)
        Setter for the maker of the vehicle.
        Parameters:
        make - the maker of the vehicle, where the maker must be within 3 to 15 characters.
        Returns:
        true is correct maker name format, otherwise false.

      • setModel

        public boolean setModel(java.lang.String model)
        Setter for the model of the vehicle.
        Parameters:
        model - the model of the vehicle, where the maker must be within 3 to 15 characters.
        Returns:
        true is correct model name format, otherwise false.

      • setModelYear

        public boolean setModelYear(int modelYear)
        Setter for the model year of the vehicle.
        Parameters:
        modelYear - the model of the vehicle, where the model year must be more than 1000.
        Returns:
        true is correct model year format, otherwise false.
